Thanks mate! Got it all loaded to the game. Every chapter and pack is viewable in-game under DLC in the menu. However only the three official chapters are playable (via the top menu). 

How do I use the packs that you have added? Like Vegas Pack and all; by the way - what are all of those packs? Maybe I can read more about them somewhere?

Thanks!
...the message/questions above was of course to you DeMoGoGoN , didn't mention your name there though :)
Thankyou Dude

@J288 The Vegas pack and the others are car packs, once you complete the first 2 or 3 missions and park your first car in the garage, you can press x at the garage to open a menu and it shows all your dlc cars for you to take out and drive, some of these packs also add clothing which can be changed into at the wardrobe inside your house.

Hey man disregard my last comment. Turns out I did not do everything right. When I made the 0000000000000000 folder I didn't put it under content, i just put it under Data.  So then I just moved that folder to Content and worked perfectly. That's my bad man, and thanks for the upload, I seeded too. :)
